comments:
Build 20020214 new team support

I was attempting to release my changes to the dev.eclipse.org repository and 
received a cryptic error : invalid packet:1 3 times. When I tried to release 
the 4th time I got the NullPointerException below.

Log: Mon Feb 25 15:57:13 EST 2002
4 org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui 1 Internal error
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh.Client$StandardInputStream.read
(Client.java:152)
	at java.io.BufferedInputStream.fill(BufferedInputStream.java(Compiled 
Code))
	at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java(Compiled 
Code))
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.Connection.readLine
(Connection.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Session.readLine
(Session.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.processResponses
(Command.java:458)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute
(Command.java:397)
	at org.eclipse.team.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.checkin
(CVSTeamProvider.java:316)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.RepositoryManager.commit
(RepositoryManager.java:488)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CommitSyncAction.run
(CommitSyncAction.java:177)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.MergeAction$1.execute
(MergeAction.java:105)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1232)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:78)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)

Probably related to a bogus server state about a half hour ago that has since
been fixed. Perhaps we could give a better error. (Strange, we gota better error
than that).

Closing PR. This was due to a strange server state that has since been fixed. If
we have a repeatable case in the future we can investigate making the error
condition nicer.
